60367/u 0: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 22 10 2 Robin 22 13 0 Lewis -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 500/playSound busDoorOpen/pause 5000/viewport 23 10 clamp true/move farmer 0 2 2/playMusic SettlingIn/speak Robin "안녕! 네가 @구나.#$b#난 로빈이라고 해, 우리 동네 목수야. 루이스 시장님께서 너를 데리고 농장으로 오라고 마중 보내셨어. 시장님은 이미 농장에서 정리하면서 기다리고 계셔. #$b#농장은 이쪽이야, 나 따라오면 돼."/viewport move 0 2 800/move Robin 0 5 2 true/pause 800/move farmer 0 4 2 true/fade/speed farmer 2/viewport -200 -200/changeLocation Farm/halt/warp Robin 78 17/faceDirection Robin 3/warp farmer 79 17/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 70 16 clamp/viewport move -1 0 4000/move Robin -8 0 3 farmer -8 0 3/pause 700/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "여기가 바로 %farm 농장이야."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 94/jump farmer/startJittering/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/showFrame 0/stopJittering/pause 800/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 200/speak Robin "왜 그래?#$b#물론, 잡초가 마구 자랐긴 하지만, 그 밑에 좋은 땅이 있다고.#$b#조금만 전념하면 금세 정리할 수 있을 거야."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/move Robin -7 0 0 farmer -7 0 0/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 0/speak Robin "...그리고 여기가 네 새 집이야.$h"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Lewis 64 15/pause 1500/speak Lewis "아, 새로 오신 농부!$h"/move Lewis 0 1 2/move Lewis 1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 600/speak Lewis "환영하네! 난 루이스라고 해, 펠리컨 마을의 시장이지.#$b#있지, 다들 자네에 대해 물어보더군.#$b#매일 누가 이사오는 게 아니거든. 관심받을 만큼 큰일이야!"/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 500/speak Lewis "그래... 자네 할아버지의 옛 오두막으로 이사하는 거구먼.#$b#좋은 집이야... 아주 ‘소박’하지."/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0/viewport move 0 -1 2000/pause 3000/speak Robin "소박? 뭐 그런 표현을 쓸 수도 있겠네요...$4#$b#’구린’이 더 맞는 표현인 것 같네요.$4"/faceDirection Lewis 3 true/jump Lewis/shake Lewis 1600/textAboveHead Lewis "무례하긴!"/showFrame Lewis 24/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Robin 2 true/pause 100/animate Robin false true 100 32 33/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/showFrame Lewis 12/stopAnimation Robin/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1/showFrame Lewis 12/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Lewis "로빈 말은 듣지 말게, @. 집을 업그레이드 하게끔 바람 넣는 걸세.$u"/showFrame Lewis 12/showFrame Robin 19/shake Robin 800/pause 1200/showFrame Robin 0/pause 600/animate Robin false true 300 34 35/textAboveHead Robin "흥."/pause 1500/speak Lewis "여하튼... 멀리서 왔으니 피곤하겠어. 좀 쉬게나.#$b#내일은 마을도 돌아보고 주민들에게 자신을 소개하는 것도 좋을 걸세.#$b#마을 사람들도 좋아할 거야."/move Lewis 4 0 1 true/viewport move 1 0 2000/pause 3000/proceedPosition Lewis/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "아, 깜빡할뻔했네. 혹시 팔고 싶은 것이 있다면, 이 상자에 두게. 밤에 내가 와서 가져가겠네.#$b#그럼... 행운을 비네!"/pause 300/move Lewis 8 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 0/stopAnimation Robin/advancedMove Robin false 0 1 2 0 0 -1 5 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound rooster/pause 1000/end beginGame
4081148/e 47/t 1600 1900: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 23 22 0 Sam 24 10 2 Sebastian 25 11 3 Emily 20 11 3 Maru 19 10 2 Shane 22 15 0 Elliott 27 14 1 Leah 28 14 3 Abigail 23 11 1 Penny 28 10 3 Harvey 18 11 1 Linus 31 5 2 Jodi 18 15 2 Vincent 18 16 0/viewport 22 11 clamp true/skippable/move farmer 0 -10 0 true/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/proceedPosition Shane/warp Shane -100 -100/proceedPosition farmer/move farmer 1 0 0 false/speak Sam "안녕 @. 와줘서 고마워."/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection Sam 2/speak Sam "일단, 장비는 이미 다 실었고... 갈 준비 다 된 것 같네."/jump Sam/pause 800/speak Sam "좋아, 다들... 버스에 타자!$u"/pause 600/move Abigail -1 0 0 true/move Emily 1 0 1 true/faceDirection Maru 1/proceedPosition Abigail/move Abigail 0 -2 2 true/move Sebastian -3 0 0 true/move Elliott -5 0 0 true/move Leah -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 3000/speak Sam "*꿀꺽*... 나 갑자기 긴장돼.$8"/pause 1000/playSound busDoorOpen/pause 4000/speak Sam "좋아, 도착했네... 행운을 빌어줘!$u"/pause 800/changeToTemporaryMap SamShow false/warp Sam 18 14/faceDirection Sam 0 true/warp Sebastian 21 14/positionOffset Sebastian 20 -20/warp Abigail 15 13/positionOffset Abigail 40 -24/warp farmer 18 20/warp Elliott 20 19/faceDirection Elliott 0/warp Leah 21 19/faceDirection Leah 0 true/warp Maru 13 16/faceDirection Maru 1 true/warp Harvey 14 17/faceDirection Harvey 0 true/warp Emily 21 16/faceDirection Emily 0 true/warp Shane 16 20/warp Linus 31 14/faceDirection Linus 0 true/warp Penny 17 16/faceDirection Penny 0 true/faceDirection Sebastian 2 true/warp Jodi 11 19/warp Vincent 12 19/faceDirection Jodi 0/viewport 18 15 true/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 3000/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 800/jump Sam/pause 1000/cutscene bandFork/mail afterSamShow/end dialogue Sam "공연은 대성공이었어! 정말 고마워, @."

봐, 터널러들이 공격 중이야!$10"/showFrame Shane 0/pause 1500/playSound Stadium_cheer/pause 500/showFrame Shane 31/jump Shane/textAboveHead Shane "골!!"/jump Alex/jump Gus/pause 100/textAboveHead Alex "골!"/pause 2000/jump Shane/pause 2000/showFrame Shane 34/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/showFrame farmer 94/pause 800/showFrame farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1 true/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 1000/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Shane 12/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Shane 1/speak Shane "오!...$10"/move Shane 1 0 1/speak Shane "음... 미안... 좀 너무 흥분했지.$10#$b#약간 너무 많이 마셨나..."/pause 3000/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 800/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 1000/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/showFrame Shane 18/pause 800/showFrame Shane 0/pause 800/showFrame Shane 34/specificTemporarySprite heart 22 18/pause 3000/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 3000/playMusic none/pause 1000/speak Shane "그래... 확실히 정말 좋은 경기였어.$l"/pause 2000/speak Shane "아, 맞아... 게다가 이겼지.$l"/pause 1000/pause 1000/speak Shane "그럼... 나중에 또 봐.$6"/pause 2000/end
